last_episode_to_air.name: Meet the Family Portrait
last_episode_to_air.overview: In the series finale, Mr. Brown decides to have a family portrait. However, a series of conflict prevents it from happening.

name: Meet the Browns
overview: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns is an American sitcom created and produced by playwright, director, and producer Tyler Perry. The show revolves around a senior family living under one roof in Decatur, Georgia led by patriarch Mr. Brown and his daughter Cora Simmons. The show premiered on Wednesday, January 7, 2009 and finished its run on November 18, 2011 on TBS. It is made in the model of his play and film of the same name. The show stars David Mann and Tamela Mann, who starred in the earlier stage play and motion picture.

episodes.name: Meet Brown Meadows
episodes.overview: Brown feels like he did a good job fixing up the house without having any help and without spending any money. But once the house starts falling apart, he realizes he needs some help. Cora lets Brown know that she put up flyers around the church in search of help for the home. Brown agrees to interview some people. After several failed interviews, he hires Jesus as his janitor, who only speaks a little English. Instead of fixing the things that Brown gives him to do, he fixes things that aren’t broken. Brown soon gives up hope that the house will be in any condition to open for business, but with everyone’s help, they get the house in order.

episodes.name: Meet London and the Competition
episodes.overview: An owner of another elderly home nearby accuses Brown of stealing her client, Daisy LaRue. Daisy likes it at Brown’s home and decides to stay. Cora tries to tell Brown about some of Miss Daisy’s odd behavior, but he pays her no mind. Will, Brown’s nephew, comes by and explains to Brown that taking care of the elderly is going to be hard. Brown doesn’t think it will be, and as long as he gets a few more residents like Miss Daisy, he’ll be fine. To recruit more residents, Brown decides to have a bingo night and the winner gets a trip to Brown Meadows. Unfortunately, however, Brown’s plan doesn’t work. In addition, Miss Daisy’s check bounces, so he’s now in the red. Later, a fire breaks out at the home down the street and Brown gets excited because he just hit the geriatric jackpot! But to his dismay, all of the residents’ family members come to pick them up, leaving him with two mishaps: Ms. Edna and Colonel Jackson.

episodes.name: Meet the Dependents and the Divas
episodes.overview: Sasha and Will ponder whether to become foster parents after the Brown's welcome in a pair of troubled orphans. Meanwhile, the diva duo of London Sheraton and Miss Daisy appear on a television show where they engage in a battle of wits.

episodes.name: Meet Your Family
episodes.overview: The Brown's organize a surprise "family day" for the residents after a chaotic day within the house. Lo and behold, the only person to appear is the estranged daughter of the Colonel. Meanwhile, the neighborhood frat boys set up a step show for the residents. And Will and Sasha undergo a marriage rite of passage: their very first fight.

episodes.name: Meet Your Maker
episodes.overview: After learning that her childhood friend has died broke and alone, Ms Edna becomes very depressed and says she's lost the will to live. Cora is shocked and gets the residents to do a "This is You Life" night to show Edna just how appreciated and cherished she is.

episodes.name: Meet the Babies
episodes.overview: Brianna's very pregnant teenage friend Tamika comes to the house needing a place to stay. Brown ends up having to deliver the baby himself. Meanwhile, Miss Daisy is missing and everyone spends all day looking for her. It turns out she was making a hip-hop video

episodes.name: Meet the Dangerous and the Deadline
episodes.overview: When Sasha learns that a former abusive boyfriend has been released from prison, she must face her past once again when he pays her a visit. And Brown is under pressure when he discovers his raffle ticket to the Bahamas cruise is missing.

episodes.name: Meet the Faithless and the Faithful
episodes.overview: Brown has lost a gospel-choir contest for six years now to the same flamboyant nemesis and is working hard to win this year. Elsewhere, Cora's longtime friend ends up on a walk on the wild side while coming for a visit.

episodes.name: Meet the Parents & the Plant
episodes.overview: Will and Sasha do all they can to keep Brianna and Joaquin from being adopted. Elsewhere, Brown tries to uncover evidence that the neighborhood's frat boys are growing their own marijuana.

episodes.name: Meet the Matchmaker
episodes.overview: Brown secretly tries to arrange a date for Cora by tapping into an online dating service. Elsewhere, unexpected problems arise as London and Jesus try to prepare Miss Daisy for an audition.

episodes.name: Meet Career Day
episodes.overview: Brianna's school is holding a career day and Will is planning to attend, but Brown must replace him after Will is sidelined by an emergency. Meanwhile, Brown decides he's in need of a makeover.

episodes.name: Meet the Mexican
episodes.overview: Jesus asks Brown and the gang to pose as his servants to impress his visiting father. Meanwhile, London awaits her dad's visit, but it may not meet to her expectations.

episodes.name: Meet the Entrepreneur
episodes.overview: Will is afraid the he is not being a good enough father by causing so much drama around the children. Meanwhile, Brown decides he will try to market his secret recipe for his zippy barbecue sauce, but he seems to have lost the recipe.

episodes.name: Meet the Secret
episodes.overview: Drama's surrounding his baseball coach has Joaquin thrown a curveball. Meanwhile, Cora pressures Brown to make out his will, giving Brown the notion that she's out to kill him off.

episodes.name: Meet the Intervention
episodes.overview: Brown seems to be addicted to the lottery and the gang believes he needs an intervention. Elsewhere, Brianna is flustered after a boy makes romantic moves on her.

episodes.name: Meet the New Job
episodes.overview: Cora is hired as a full-time teacher, but will she past the test when a student comes to class drunk? Meanwhile, the Colonel looks for a job after discovering his nest egg is empty.

episodes.name: Meet the Gold Digger
episodes.overview: Brown gets a new girlfriend, but she may only be after his money. Elsewhere, Brianna is caught shoplifting.

episodes.name: Meet the Sweet Tooth
episodes.overview: Cora decides to enlists Sasha's help in shedding some weight. Meanwhile, Brown tries to win a vacation by selling candy.

episodes.name: Meet the Matrimony
episodes.overview: The gang receives a surprise when Edna announces she is engaged. But no one is as surprised as her fiance. Meanwhile, Will gets some exposure, maybe too much, after posing for a calendar for charity.

episodes.name: Meet the Man and the Mouse
Meet The H.B.I.C
episodes.overview: Cora and Sasha have a domestic power struggle when they clash over who rules the household. Elsewhere, Brown runs an emergency-preparedness drill.

episodes.name: Meet The Troublemaker
episodes.overview: One of Cora’s students is being bullied and she must try to help him before it’s too late. Elsewhere, with her probation nearing its end, a wistful London realizes Brown Meadows has become her home and that she will miss everyone.

episodes.name: Meet The Naked Truth
episodes.overview: Sasha returns home from a night out in a boozy condition causing Brianna and Joaquin to be alarmed. Elsewhere, Brown and the Colonel attend Miss Daisy’s art class.

episodes.name: Meet the Two Left Feet
episodes.overview: Will takes secret Salsa-dancing lessons so he can take Sasha to a party, but Sasha thinks he's cheating on her. The Colonel and Edna decide to move in together, down the street from Brown Meadows.

episodes.name: Meet the Lessons
episodes.overview: The family finds out that Brianna is taking birth-control pills. Meanwhile Cora is attracted to her school's new principal, who was her old high-school friend, and decides to spend time with him and gets more than she bargained for in a spin class.

episodes.name: Meet The Big Wedding
episodes.overview: The Colonel suffers a heart attack at the altar. Reggie asks a reluctant Cora to marry him.

episodes.name: Meet the Product Party
episodes.overview: Cora asks Renee to do a product-demonstration at her women's social group and they're shocked when Renee reveals the products. Brianna confronts pregnant Simone when she drinks at a party.

episodes.name: Meet the Crush
episodes.overview: Derek has a crush on Renee. Brown gets fired from the school, forbidden to return until he apologizes to Gordon: a loathsome prospect.

episodes.name: Meet the Harassment
episodes.overview: A woman charges Sasha with sexual harassment. Joaquin's concerned teacher visits the house when he writes an essay about his family.

episodes.name: Meet the Replacement
episodes.overview: When Renee quits, Sasha hires a replacement who's even worse. Derek turns to Brown when he loses his girlfriend.

episodes.name: Meet the New Reggie
episodes.overview: Brown and Derek help Reggie improve himself to win Cora. Meanwhile Renee's ex comes in for a checkup, only to receive shocking news.

episodes.name: Meet the Shopacholic
episodes.overview: Cora gets addicted to online shopping. Meanwhile Brown finds an artifact in his backyard, which leads him to digging for treasure.

episodes.name: Meet the Patience
episodes.overview: Cora's patience is tested when an lonely old lady continues to show up at her door looking for a companion. Brianna gets her first job at a fast food restaurant.

episodes.name: Meet the Dealmaker
episodes.overview: A friend of Reggie's tries to illegally recruit on Reggie's players. Joaquin writes an essay for Brianna. The essay wins the prize.

episodes.name: Meet the Real Wedding
episodes.overview: Colonel and Edna finally get ready for their wedding, and they seek help from the Brown family. Elsewhere, Renee does a good deed for Sasha, but she expects something in return.

episodes.name: Meet the Knock-Off
episodes.overview: Cora buys an expensive purse, but claims that it is an inexpensive copy. Yvonne sells candy, raising suspision in Mr. Brown.

episodes.name: Meet the Reunion
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown clashes with his former singing group member (Eddie Levert) as they prepare for their class reunion. Renee babysits Joaquin and seeks his input when she gambles.

episodes.name: Meet the Whodunit
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown tries to figure out who ate his rice and gravy. Renee faces possible termination after being investigated by a member of the Nurses Auditing Board.

episodes.name: Meet the Telethon
episodes.overview: Sasha host a telethon to raise 100,000 and Mr. Brown knocks out the star.

episodes.name: Meet the Hustle
episodes.overview: Mr. Brown and Colonel tries to get even with the gangsters that ripped them off. Renee sells wigs at the hospital.

episodes.name: Meet the Switch
episodes.overview: Will and Joaquin magically switch bodies after Joaquin wished to be an adult. Mr. Brown tries to get in contact with the electric company regarding his electric bill.

episodes.name: Meet the Family Portrait
episodes.overview: In the series finale, Mr. Brown decides to have a family portrait. However, a series of conflict prevents it from happening.
